page.title: 16BOGMILL
page.content: {Paul Mason}lives at{Bogmill Farm},a small holding of 3 acres with buildings dating back to the 18th century.He goes to the{Duke's school } in Alnwick and helps with the sheep,goats,rabbits,chickens,ducks, geese and calves when he goes home. He has a{3 wheeler Honda 70}with{thick {tyres}and he helped his dad to put a ball hitch on the back to take a trailer.Because he is only 11 he can't take a vehicle on the road,but he can drive this anywhere on the farm. He says it is great fun. {Bog Mill}was a{carding mill.}Carding was a process in the{woollen industry. The mill dated from about the same time as{Denwick Mill}house and mill and was demolished about the turn of the century.The present house was built just before the 1st World War and extended in 1983.
